topic.title: ZeroNet Mobile is an Android App which has py3 support
topic.body:
Download link to PlayStore.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.canews.zeronet

Github Releases Page
https://github.com/canewsin/zeronet_mobile/releases

Older Version Releases are available at
https://github.com/canewsin/ZeroNet/releases

ApkPure Link
https://apkpure.com/p/in.canews.zeronet

ApkFiles.com Link
https://www.apkfiles.com/apk-604585/zeronet-mobile

App is OpenSource Now, Source code is Available at
https://github.com/canewsin/zeronet_mobile

Report your Issues, feedback and post your feature requests here.
ZeroNet Mobile
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15UYrA7aXr2Nto1Gg4yWXpY3EAJwafMTNk/
